lessonOutcomes.outcome: Students can read along with the story, participate in group role-plays, and complete sentences to show their understanding of the text.
Students can express ideas confidently through role-play, work creatively with a partner to retell key parts of the story, and recognise how the characters feel during the events.
Students can work together to complete a story map and reflect on what the characters learned, discussing the storyâ€™s message and how it applies to their own lives.
